code: import axios from"axios";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UpdateUser=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[name,setName]=useState();const[email,setEmail]=useState();const[age,setAge]=useState();const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{axios.get('https://merncrudbackend-1zpv.onrender.com/getUser/'+id).then(result=>{setName(result.data.name);setEmail(result.data.email);setAge(result.data.age);}).catch(err=>console.log(err));},[id]);const Update=e=>{e.preventDefault();axios.put("https://merncrudbackend-1zpv.onrender.com/updateUser/"+id,{name,email,age}).then(result=>{console.log(result);navigate('/');}).catch(err=>console.log(err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex vh-100 bg-primary justify-content-center align-items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-50 bg-white rounded p-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:Update,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Update User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter Your Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter Your Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"age",children:"Age :"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter Your Age",value:age,onChange:e=>setAge(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success",children:"Update"})]})})});};export default UpdateUser;
